protein.specific_function: May play a role in regulation of differentiation. In vitro, binds RNA, preferentially to both poly(G) and poly(U). Overexpressed, blocks differentiation of K562 leukemia cells following treatment with phorbol esters or sodium butyrate without affecting proliferation
